description: The Coby Deep Bass Headphones & Stereo Earphones Combo Pack, in black, gives you the best of both worlds. The deep bass headphones deliver great, resonant lows, providing a premium listening experience. An adjustable headband lets you experience your music in complete comfort, while a compact folding design makes for easy storage and portability. The isolation stereo headphones features an in-ear isolation system to block background noise while delivering crisp sound.
title: Coby CV215BLK Deep Bass Stereo Headphones and Earphones (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
